title: Garry's Mod 12 and Garry's Mod 11
description:
This is categorized in other because it technically isn't a full game, it is a mod. This is for the pc ONLY.

This torrent contains GMod 11 and GMod 12. These are steam sourcemods. There is no crack included. Below is a list of changes:

- Renamed the game folders to garrysmod11   and   garrysmod12

- Added CS:S content to GMod 12 (sound files are there but are improperly installed)

- Added some addons to GMod 12

- Renamed the game names in the gameinfo.txt


- Added join links to my community servers to the game main menu


Please note that this REQUIRES steam to work. And I will not help if you crack this.

To run this game on steam you need the Source SDK Base 2007 installed as well as a source game. Please note the content from other games (except the hl2 base stuff) will not work as it no longer uses gcf format.
